title: Version 1.7.1
changes: Improved mobile frontend experience.
Added more precise specification of software requirements for masz.
Removed unneeded apache files from old php setup.
Now correctly reapplies muted role on member rejoin.
Fixed a bug where banned guilds are not displayed correctly.
Improved UX during guild register.
Added loading spinner on index page.

title: Version 1.7 Angular Rework
changes: Reworked frontend. Now using Angular instead of PHP.
Fixed some link issues in announcement embeds.
Fixed date format in announcement embed.
Fixed wrong punishment due to Chrome Autotranslate.

title: Version 1.6 Automoderation
changes: Fixed sorting in modcase table.
Reworked notification system. Now using JQuery Toast.
Fixed style in guild register dialog.
Added automoderation feature.
Added invite command.
Fixed url for default profil pictures in announcement.
Fixed output of register command in DMs.
Added information of punishment duration in announcement embed.

title: Version 1.5.1
changes: Fixed link in announcement embeds.
Now limiting the description in case overview list so buttons do not bug.
Added info about command arguments in help command.
Also add label after pressing enter.

title: Version 1.5
changes: Added pretty help command to discord bot.
Added url command to discord bot.
Added feature command to discord bot.
Added register command to discord bot.
Added whois command to discord bot.
Added more style to the register guild form.
Now ignoring spaces in user id while creating cases.
Reapplying muted role if user rejoins guild.
Reworked dark mode.

title: Version 1.4
changes: Added discord username to announcements.
Files are now removed on guild deletion if wanted.
Improved guild deletion form.
Using correct permissions on guild invite link.
Added webhook notification for files.
Added more information to all webhook notifications.
Added simple discord bot.
Fixed rate limit for assets.
You can no longer create cases against site admins.

title: Version 1.3 - Fileupload
changes: Added suggestions and first steps tips.
Added file uploads in case overview.
Reworked case overview into tab system.
Added toggle for suggestions in the settings tab.

title: Version 1.2 - Automated punishment
changes: Added form to delete and edit guild configuration via frontend.
Public announcement embeds do not contain case description anymore.
Added DatePicker to case forms.
Reworked display of case details.
Added automated punishments that get handled by backend.
Added punishment tab that displays all current punishments.

title: Version 1.1 - Darkmode
changes: Reworked dialog to register guilds.
Fixed a bug that occures if the bot gets removed from a registered guild.
Added default darkmode. Toggleable in settings top right corner.
Fixed unstyled checkbox.

title: Version 1.0 - First major release
changes: Added support for default discord user avatar.
Added modcase comments.
Login now correctly returns to the requested url.
It is now possible to delete modcases via frontend.
Fixed query filters in case overview.

title: Version 0.4
changes: Added button for moderators to view all cases they created
Added info box if modcases are viewed as normal member without special permissions.
ModCases are now editable.
Added more info and content to login page.
Fixed a bug that many fields in modcases could be edited to be null or empty.
Fixed edit form to display 'EDIT CASE' instead of 'CREATE CASE'

title: Version 0.3
changes: Added form to register guilds via frontend.
Fixed a bug that modcase labels could be duplicated.
Added choice dropdown for the punishment field in case creation
Added choice dropdown for the severity field in case creation.
Now displaying the correct case id in the tab title.
'See more patch notes here.' now redirects to github release page.
The OAuth login no longer opens in a new tab.

title: Version 0.2
changes: Fixed display of last moderator id.
Added search field for modcase table.
Added option to use labels properly on case creation.

title: Version 0.1
changes: Added logout option in the profile dropdown.
No longer accepting modcases for Discord bots.
Only show edit/delete/create buttons if user is a moderator or admin.

title: Added Patch Notes
changes: Added Patch Notes.
